.tooltip-wrapper {\n                position: relative;\n                display: inline-block;\n              }\n              \n              .tooltip-content {\n                position: absolute;\n                bottom: 100%;\n                left: 50%;\n                transform: translateX(-50%);\n                margin-bottom: 8px;\n                padding: 8px 12px;\n
